alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 5:45PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MADERA...CENTRAL MERCED AND WESTERN FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM PST... At 544 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Firebaugh, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. Heavy rain could lead to nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could lead to nuisance flooding in low lying or flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Firebaugh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not attempt to cross flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
